html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07892017-06-20TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (International Harmonization Update, 2016)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (INTERNATIONAL HARMONIZATION UPDATE, 2016) in order to (1) harmonize the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) with international regulatory requirements; (2) introduce the ambulatory incorporation by reference; (3) reduce regulatory barriers to cross-border trade with the United States; (4) eliminate the need to obtain an equivalency certificate in order to transport hot air balloon cylinders of propane by road, rail or ship; and (5) update the TDGR to reflect the requirements in PD 38 regarding the accelerated phase-out of legacy DOT-111 tank cars.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0137 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (International Harmonization Update, 2016)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (INTERNATIONAL HARMONIZATION UPDATE, 2016) in order to (1) harmonize the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) with international regulatory requirements; (2) introduce the ambulatory incorporation by reference; (3) reduce regulatory barriers to cross-border trade with the United States; (4) eliminate the need to obtain an equivalency certificate in order to transport hot air balloon cylinders of propane by road, rail or ship; and (5) update the TDGR to reflect the requirements in PD 38 regarding the accelerated phase-out of legacy DOT-111 tank cars.
